Name: Monkey Adventure
About the game: Monkey Adventure is a 2D platform game. You, as Chikka the monkey, are exploring the jungle and stumble upon a shiny coin, it turns out to be a time-lost Atstek gold coin, collect all the gold coins, exchange them to improve your character for further searches. Also collect peach kernels to always be alert and not lose stamina. Be careful, on your way there will be monsters that will let you go further, only your dexterity, skill and advancement of the character will allow you to defeat them. Features: - 36 classic levels - Each level has its own gorgeous scene - Many different monsters and obstacles - Each character has their own way of attacking
